com.lavanya.web.controller

Class CommentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lavanya.web.controller.CommentController

  • @Controller
public class CommentController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller used in MVC architecture to control all the requests related to Comment object.

    • Method Detail

      • showFeedback

        @GetMapping(value="/feedback/{id}")
public java.lang.String showFeedback(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                          int childcareId,
                                                                          @RequestParam(value="value")
                                                                          java.lang.String feedbackAuthor,
                                                                          javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                          org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        GET requests for /feedback/{id} endpoint. This controller-method displays the form to comment a childcare by the user connected.
        Parameters:
        childcareId - id of the childcare to comment
        feedbackAuthor - string to identify if the author of the comment is the user in charge or in need in this specific childcare.
        model - to pass data to the view.
        session - a HttpSession where attributes of interest are stored, here it concerns the token generated following user connection.
        Returns:
        addCommentAndRating.html

      • saveComment

        @PostMapping(value="/saveComment")
public java.lang.String saveComment(@Valid @ModelAttribute(value="commentDto")
                                                                        @Valid CommentDto commentDto,
                                                                        org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                                                        @ModelAttribute(value="feedbackAuthor")
                                                                        java.lang.String feedbackAuthor,
                                                                        @ModelAttribute(value="childcareId")
                                                                        int childcareId,
                                                                        javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                        org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        POST requests for /saveComment endpoint. This controller-method is part of CRUD and is used to save in database Comment object.
        Parameters:
        commentDto - which is is the comment to save.
        result - check if there is any error in the comment object before savoing it.
        childcareId - id of the childcare to comment.
        feedbackAuthor - string to identify if the author of the comment is the user in charge or in need in this specific childcare.
        session - a HttpSession where attributes of interest are stored, here it concerns the token generated following user connection.
        model - to pass data to the view.
        Returns:
        childcaresRequestsDashboard.html or childcaresMissionsDashboard.html according to the feedbackAuthor.
